it.polimi.se2019.server.games.player

Class CharacterState

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.util.Observable<Response>
      • it.polimi.se2019.server.games.player.CharacterState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CharacterState
extends Observable<Response>
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class contains the information about a character, it's meant to be serialized. A read-only copy of this object should be stored in the client (view).
    Author:
    Rodolfo Mariotti
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getPossibleActions

        public java.util.List<CompositeAction> getPossibleActions(boolean isFrenzy)
        The getPossibleActions method returns the list of actions that a player can perform according to their damage bar and the mode of the game(normal or frenzy).
        Parameters:
        isFrenzy - is a boolean that indicates the game mode.
        Returns:
        the list of allowed actions.

      • swapValueBar

        public void swapValueBar(boolean isFrenzy)
        The swapValueBar method swaps out the current value bar of the player with the correct one according to the game mode.
        Parameters:
        isFrenzy - is a boolean that indicates the game mode.

        Parameters:

        game - the game the player is playing

      • addMarker

        public void addMarker(PlayerColor playerColor,
                      java.lang.Integer amount)
        This method allow the user to set markers on the character. A character can have uo to 3 markers of each color.
        Parameters:
        playerColor - color of the marker
        amount - number of markers

      • addAmmo

        public void addAmmo(java.util.Map<AmmoColor,java.lang.Integer> ammoToAdd)
        The addAmmo method adds a certain amount of new ammo to the ammoBag; it keeps an ammo color's max value to 3.
        Parameters:
        ammoToAdd - is a map containing the amount of each ammo color to add to the player's ammoBag

        Parameters:

      • updateScore

        public void updateScore(PlayerDeath message,
                        PlayerColor playerColor)
        This method parses a player death and updates the player score accordingly. Notifies registered observers of the changes.
        Parameters:
        message - contains the data to update the player score
        playerColor - must match the color of this player

      • getValueBar

        public int[] getValueBar()
        Getter method for the valueBar attribute.
        Returns:
        an array that contains in order the points that each player that damages this player will get when this player is killed

      • isBeforeFrenzyActivator

        public boolean isBeforeFrenzyActivator()
        Getter method for the beforeFrenzyActivator.
        Returns:
        true if the player's turn is before the one of the player that triggered frenzy, false otherwise.

      • isFirstSpawn

        public boolean isFirstSpawn()
        Getter method for the firstSpawn attribute.
        Returns:
        true if the player spawned at least once during this game, false otherwise

        Parameters:

      • isDead

        Returns:
        true if the player is dead, false if is alive
